title: Can't Get TFT Beta Pass Rewards
body:
So I went and played a few hours of TFT and was completing the beta pass quests to get the rewards and blah blah blah as anyone would, when I hit level 2 on the beta pass and accepted the arrowhead and runic arena skins I straight away went to my lobby to change it to arrow head to match with my tier 2 Lunarclaw Hauntling which i spent 50 dollars on by the way, but that's besides the fact that it says for me that both arena skins are still locked for me. How do I even fix this? Beta Pass progress screenshot https://imgur.com/U1z3Dqz   Screenshot of no arena skins https://imgur.com/2erPf9F
In the end i'm still going to play the hell out of TFT just a little sad that it was brought out so soon when they have so many bugs to work on

replies.body:
this is still a problem - has not yet been fixed.
Orb of enlightenment also stuck on "creating a new orb, hang on a sec"

please all send in your support tickets!
Just re-log and all your stuff will be unlocked

Getting the same issue myself. Just unlocked the map skins and they're still showing up as locked in lobby. It *might* just be that it's taking several hours to actually become available after it's unlocked (sometimes happens with other loot/rewards), so it may just be a matter of waiting for a while. If nothing's changed tomorrow, it would be prudent to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if they can help out.
Upvoted. This is also my problem. I even restarted the client and played another game and it still did not unlock for me.

well i dont wanna be heard rude but lets be realistic for once

We playing a game which it's client services are the WORST by far in existence,do you honestly thought that this whole client after that patch would have been working properly? 

I dont think so, Riot's client hasnt changed for 6 years now and they didnt evolve it in a good way, the only good change they have done is the accessibility of purchasing Skins,RP 

Like we have been playing for those 4 days while Riot's client was running under certain problems (disconection issues without relogin again, huge lag spikes for no reason)  and none riot's employeer came out for an apologize and apart from that no one ever mentioned to gave us back our lost League Points due to Riot's issues

Dont expect this game to work smoothly after each patch, mostly the game will run smoothly after 2 days of each new patch they adding
